channel.title: [317][Delta]All my questions are now here
channel.description:
For now, all the questions I ask will be here. ------------------------------------------------------------ Adding Equipment Screen?
How do I add an equipment screen to my deltascape server?
------------------------------------------------------------ How to add 63 waves fight caves?
How do I add 63 waves to fight caves. You guys, this will be really appreciated. ------------------------------------------------------------ NpcDialogues.cfg editing?
How do I make dialogues for NPC's? ------------------------------------------------------------ What the heck?
What the heck is the point of a restarter and a server runtime manager? ------------------------------------------------------------ 317 type 'n' close
When someone types something on my server and presses enter, the server x's out. I'm using 317 server, so please help moparscape m8s. :) ------------------------------------------------------------
Replying Format: [code] What question you replying for?: Answer: [/code]

For now, all the questions I ask will be here.

Adding Equipment Screen?

How do I add an equipment screen to my deltascape server?

How to add 63 waves fight caves?

NpcDialogues.cfg editing?

How do I make dialogues for NPC’s?

What the heck?

What the heck is the point of a restarter and a server runtime manager?

317 type ‘n’ close

When someone types something on my server and presses enter, the server x’s out. I’m using 317 server, so please help moparscape m8s.
